short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the secrets of affordable living in NYC! Find rent-controlled apartments in a snap and never overpay for rent again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Labels rental listing as "Rent Controlled" if the build is a New York rent controlled building. 
Supports StreetEasy and Zillow.
